subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Ivo Karlovic’s serve and volley was too much for Jo-Wilfried Tsonga, and Roger Federer, Robin Soderling and Serena Williams also advanced to the fourth round.
snippet: Ivo Karlovic’s serve and volley was too much for Jo-Wilfried Tsonga, and Roger Federer, Robin Soderling and Serena Williams also advanced to the fourth round.
